edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface ItemInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Corpse, Food, Item, MartianItem, Plank, PortableItem, Shotgun, Stick, Stunt, Vehicle, VehicleBattery, VehicleKey, WeaponItem, ZombieArms, ZombieClub, ZombieLegs, ZombieMace

    public interface ItemInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean isShotGun() 
      default boolean isStun() 
      default boolean isZombieArms() 
      default boolean isZombieLegs()
